title: Can we download books from Wattpad? - Quora

response.answer_text: #Question name: Can we downnload books from Wattpad? TopEbooks365 is one of the best frree b.o.o.ks and e.b.o.o.k site now. Total eboooks: 42,800,000+ Just regisster an acccount, then downlload your eboook version at: TopEbooks365 .club/2019/02/ebook-24623566.html Other sites to downlload eboooks related: 1. OpenLibrary 2. ProjectGutenberg 3. ManyBooks 4. Bookboon 5. LibriVox 6. Slideshare 7. Google docs

Wattpad doesn't allow you to actually download the book. But you can load the book and save it in your library. And once the book is loaded then you can read it offline too through the app. You also get notified when new chapters are updated. You can text me directly on Wattpad too for any Wattpad related issues. My username is - KarishmaY

You cannot exactly download books on Wattpad but you can download the Wattpad app and save stories offline, to enable reading them without internet. Just select the ‘+’ that is next to every book, and add to your private library (not any reading list) to enable offline reading.

No, you can't. But they will be available offline for you to read. There are some published Wattpad stories too. Although you can only find them on Amazon, Flipkart, etc. You have to contact either the author or check out their bio to know more details about it.
